title: Offshore Incorporated (2015)
overview: Donne's film points out the major features of the tax avoidance landscape: tax havens, brass plates, capital flight, crown dependencies, and the like.
storyline: Ever wonder where billions of dollars in private wealth and corporate profits are being hidden? OFFSHORE INCORPORATED explores the rampant tax avoidance schemes found in the UK and around the world today which keep billions from contributing to the bottom lines of national governments or aiding the needy around the globe. Narrated by Dominic West and featuring music from Radiohead's Thom Yorke and Massive Attack's Robert del Naja.
